alldb.table_sql: select base.id,base.file_name filename,base.file_address fileaddress,base.create_date createdate,usr.realname_ realname, base.file_size filesize from base_file base left join t_users usr on base.creator_=usr.id_ where base.flow_unid='{custid}' and base.invalid_='æ˜¯' order by base.create_date desc
